search_keywords: Amoris diuini et humani effectus varii Sacræ Scripturæ Sanctorumq; PP. sententijs : ac Gallicis versibus illustrati Snyders, Michael. Schoor, Gillis van b. 1596 Mallery, Karel van 1571-ca. 1635 text be Antuerpiæ Apud Michaelem Snyders 1626 monographic lat fre reformatted digital print [57] leaves of plates ; 15 cm. Engraved throughout. Majority of plates signed by M. Snyders; many also signed G. van Schoor; one has monogram of C. de Mallery. Without signatures, pagination, or foliation.
